problem_text_cn: 如图,在⊙O内有折线OABC,其中OA=10,AB=16,∠A=∠B=60°,则BC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is a broken line OABC in ⊙O, where OA = N_0, AB = N_1, ∠A = ∠B = N_2, then the length of BC is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:延长AO交BC于D,作OH⊥BC于H,如图,∵∠A=∠B=60°,∴△ABD为等边三角形,∴∠ADB=60°,AD=BD=AB=16,∴OD=AD-OA=16-10=6,在Rt△ODH中,∠ODH=60°,∴∠DOH=30°,∴DH=\frac{1}{2}OD=3,∴BH=BD-DH=16-3=13,∵OH⊥BC,∴BH=CH=13,∴BC=2BH=26．
raw_comment: 本题考查了垂径定理:平分弦的直径平分这条弦,并且平分弦所对的两条弧．
